name: Firefox Dark Addons
description:
Dark AMO...I like the dark themes, so tried my hand at this...Comments, criticism, or suggestions are always welcomed...Thanks for trying it out...

18,000 installs...Thanks to everyone for using the style...

I updated this after using Firefox more over the past few weeks...Very nice to see a lot of installs on a weekly basis as well as the overall numbers...I hope to keep this up to date on a more consistent basis...

If you like it, leave a comment...If you don't, leave a comment...If you use it and want to alter it for your own use, go right ahead...If you wish to alter it and publish it, please let me know first...
additional_info:
It's been a while since I last updated this...Went back to using Firefox more frequently and noticed there were some subtle changes so I decided to edit this a bit more in hopes of keeping it up to date since there appears to be a lot of users that still use the style...

2/10/14 -- Subtle changes to background and navigation links...Thanks to everyone for the continued use...As always, it is appreciated...

11/2/11 -- Few areas to 'get the white out' in some areas.  In other words, minor tweaks.

9/19/11 -- Minor update as AMO has a few subtle changes...As always, comments, criticism, and the ever popular shout outs are welcomed...

8/19/11 -- Update for latest AMO site change...Hopefully skinned e'thing but if not, shout...

discussions.name: i want stylish because i ant to make my computer beautiful
My Favorite Dark Theme for Firefox Add-Ins
